column4: can ping sites but internet doenst work! cant anyone help me???
hrm... you're pinging domain names, or raw IP addresses?
so, just to be clear, you can ping a given site, but not access it with your browser?
yes, actually i cant connect with kopete too
Are you using IRC from that system right now (I'm assuming not)?
do u know how can i set my network card to work in 10mbits??
what exactly happens when you try to connect with your browser?
when i run pppoeconf it says: access concentrator of your provider did not respond, does it help?? :/
doesn't mean much to me. :( ...what happens if you "telnet www.yahoo.com 80"?
no problem if im using kubuntu right?
heh, that's a good way to get #kubuntu! shouted at you here. But I for one don't care: and it certainly shouldn't affect your problem.
that "GET" stuff was meant to be in the telnet session, BTW.
